snippet: Wall Street closed slightly lower, a day ahead of a critical policy decision by the Federal Reserve on when to reduce its monetary stimulus.
abstract: Stock market dips slightly, day ahead of a critical policy decision by the Federal Reserve on when to reduce its monetary stimulus.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street closed slightly lower, a day ahead of a critical policy decision by the Federal Reserve on when to reduce its monetary stimulus.

headline.main: Awaiting the Fed’s Decision, the Market Drops Slightly
headline.print_headline: Awaiting the Fed’s Decision, the Market Drops Slightly
